item.description:
Come and enjoy the fun as Fonzi hosts a Birthday Bash at his house.
He (and his sister Michi) will be turning 4 and would like all their puggy friends to celebrate with them.
When: Saturday - August 22nd
Where: Fonzi's yard
Time:3:00pm
We will have birthday cake and special icy treats for the pugs and some treats for the humans as well.
The yard is fully enclosed so the pugs can run and play. However, we live on a very busy main street, so hold tight to your pug while coming into the yard.
Parking is allowed on the street.
If you need directions please contact me through email. jwebster@mitre.org

PLEASE NOTE: This is a sun only event. If it rains we will have to cancel.

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: FONZI'S BIRTHDAY BASH
